quote: I close my eyes. I don't expect Four to reassure me, and he makes no effort to, but I feel better standing here than I did out there among the people who are my friends, my faction.
quote_letters: I CLOSE MY EYES I DONT EXPECT FOUR TO REASSURE ME AND HE MAKES NO EFFORT TO BUT I FEEL BETTER STANDING HERE THAN I DID OUT THERE AMONG THE PEOPLE WHO ARE MY FRIENDS MY FACTION
